quote: Quin lay down next to me and buried his face in my neck. I felt everything hidden and heavy inside him collapse in my arms. His hot tears joined with mine.""I need you.""""I know,"" I answered.
quote_letters: QUIN LAY DOWN NEXT TO ME AND BURIED HIS FACE IN MY NECK I FELT EVERYTHING HIDDEN AND HEAVY INSIDE HIM COLLAPSE IN MY ARMS HIS HOT TEARS JOINED WITH MINEI NEED YOUI KNOW I ANSWERED
